summary: A young man whose sickly grandfather has taught him a secret form of Kung Fu, starts to make a living off of his unique fighting style, only to attract the attention of his grandfather's mortal enemy.
cast: Jackie Chan|James Tien|Dean Shek|Hui-Lou Chen|Shi-Kwan Yen|Kun Li|Tien-Chi Cheng|Chih-Ping Chiang|Shao-Hua Chu|Eagle Han|Hsing-Nan Ho|Hong Hsu|Yuan Hsu|Gen-Man Huang|Sae Ok Kim|Nai-Hua Kuo|Chang Ma|Kang Peng|Li-Peng Wan|Chi-Sheng Wang|Yao Wang
title: Hiena salvaje
